items.title: Inside the Barbecue City That Is China’s Hottest Tourist Destination
items.abstract: Zibo has become a social media star for its distinctive barbecue style. Now the city is overrun with visitors.

items.title: The Stealth Campaign That’s Getting Your Kids Hooked on Chess
items.abstract: Pandemic boredom and a Netflix mini-series, “The Queen’s Gambit,” added to the game’s sudden popularity. But Chess.com was also plotting its own moves.

items.title: Behind a Surge in Teenage Killings: Grief, Anger and Online Grudges
items.abstract: Teenagers in New York City were arrested and charged with murder at a rate that grew twice as fast as the rate for adults between 2018 and 2022.

items.title: How a TikToker Brought Hundreds of Transplants to a Midwestern City
items.abstract: People hoping to become homeowners have answered the call to relocate to Peoria, Ill., where the housing is affordable and a one-person welcoming committee awaited them.

items.title: A Romantic Mexico City Dinner to Toast a Growing Fashion Brand
items.abstract: How the designer Olivia Villanti, of the line Chava Studio, threw a party and a collection launch that felt sophisticated yet low key.
